title: New skins for Champions that got skins last year -_-
body: So coming out soon are 3 new skins for {{champion:62}} {{champion:25}} and {{champion:51}} . The problem is these 3 champs got skins just last year while some champs haven't got a skin for 2 or 3 years (or a really long time).....really Riot

replies.body: Certain ideas suit better champions I guess and they go along with it, no matter who it is.
Very true, although there are the rare times where Riot goes out of their way to make a stupid skin for a champion
Yeah, oh well, not every skin will be perfect.
really? because all 3 skins for those 3 champs are ugly as anyway
the wukong skin is pretty cool, but the morg one is vomit worthy and the caitlin one looks like alien syndra found a gun...

They just do it at random, theres no other explanation

someone like swain hasn't got a skin since i started playing (which was around the time Nami cam out in season 2)
while Varus has had 4, and 2 of them were this year...

Swain also isn't popular and is hidden OP.

Varus has been on and off popular and is rather balanced.

Zed and Yasuo are both some of the most popular champs and have been for a while, and yet both have only received one skin since release (not counting SKT T1 Zed because riot didn't have a lot of choice on the champion in that scenario) 

where Anivia who like swain is also hidden OP and unpopular has received two skins recently, so I'm not quite sure what you're getting at?
Prehistoric Anivia is the only recent one i can think of, unless you can name another (and i do believe she was in meta at the time.)

Blackfrost anivia wasnt that long ago (relatively, when in comparison with people like swain and Zed etc.)

yes but not as in-the-meta as Yas/Zed/Vayne/Lee etc are (and have been for ages)

not sure i would call mid 2013 recent but whatever.

Yas/Zed/Vayne/Lee are all in meta to the point where a skin will get way too much scrutiny, imagine if the skin was slight bad for zed, the sort of backlash that Riot would take.

Like Shashe23 says tho, some champions do suit the skin more, for example it is the year of the monkey and so its obvious that they will give a skin to wukong instead someone else, just like they gave cass a skin for year of the snake.

but all the other skins you're correct, Annie and Kat etc dont need any more skins for a while, time to focus on Poppy and swain etc
